FuncDef: The display dcn brief command displays DCN configuration information.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the basic DCN configuration information, run the display dcn brief command. The basic DCN configuration information includes the NEID, NEIP address, and status of the automatic NE report function
For example, before creating a static route between an NMS and a GNE, run the display dcn brief command on the GNE to view the GNE's NEIP address and subnet mask.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
